thread.title: Kaepernick throws 2 TD passes as 49ers snap four-game skid
thread.title_full: Kaepernick throws 2 TD passes as 49ers snap four-game skid

author: JANIE McCAULEY
title: Kaepernick throws 2 TD passes as 49ers snap four-game skid
text:
Kaepernick throws 2 TD passes as 49ers snap four-game skid Associated Press | 0 comments 
SANTA CLARA, Calif. (AP) — The big plays that have eluded the 49ers most of this season showed up again, with Anquan Boldin and Torrey Smith leading the way against the very Baltimore Ravens team they helped lead to a Super Bowl victory against San Francisco three seasons ago. 
Colin Kaepernick, sporting a rare postgame tie and spectacles, is regaining some of his swagger. Even if the Niners are now just 2-4 after snapping a four-game losing streak in Sunday's 25-20 win against the hapless Ravens. kAmz26A6C?:4< 7@C @?6 :D D6?D:?8 2 D9:7E 2D 9:D E62>>2<6D D>2== DEC:56D 6249 H66<]k^Am kAmQ(6VC6 2 a\c 7@@E32== E62> E92E ?665D E@ 86E D@>6 >@C6 H:?D[Q 96 D2:5] Q~FC E62> :D 3F:=5:?8 H96C6 H6VC6 8C25F2==J A:4<:?8 FA >@>6?EF>]Qk^Am kAmr2?VE D2J E96 D2>6 7@C E96 #2G6?D W`\dX[ H9@ >256 >:DE2<6D :? 2== A92D6D 2?5 H6C6 DE:== :? :E 2E E96 6?5 H96? y@6 u=244@ E9C6H 2 56DA6C2E:@?
